name: Braixen

evolution.description: Braixen can evolve into Delphox at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Fox Pokémon. It has a twig stuck in its tail. With friction from its tail fur, it sets the twig on fire and launches into battle.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Magician
abilities.description: If not already holding an item, this Pokémon steals the held item of any Pokémon it hits with a melee attack.
